text: X-gender () is a third-gender that is not M (male or masculine) or F (female or feminine).Dale, S. P. F. (2012). An introduction to X-Jendā: Examining a new gender identity in Japan. Intersections: Gender and sexuality in Asia and the Pacific, 31. The term is used instead of non-binary and genderqueer in Japan.«ノンバイナリー（Xジェンダー）とは ». www.outjapan.co.jp (in Japanese). == References == Category:Non-binary gender
title: X-gender
